name: blackninjas-backend
description: A platform to make company global travel and accommodation easy and convenient for the strong workforce of savvy members of staff, by leveraging the modern web.

scripts.pretest-travis: NODE_ENV=testing npm run db-undo-migration && NODE_ENV=testing  npm run db-migrate
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=testing npm run db-undo-migration && NODE_ENV=testing npm run db-migrate && NODE_ENV=testing nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register --require @babel/polyfill src/tests/*.js --exit
scripts.db-seed-test: NODE_ENV=testing npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && NODE_ENV=testing sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db-seed-dev: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize db:seed:all

author: blackninjas
